t: 30:2*r That is, about 1 1/2 feet long and wide and 3 feet high or about 45 centimeters long and wide and 90 centimeters high
30:13*r That is, about 1/5 ounce or about 5.8 grams; also in verse 15
30:23*r That is, about 12 1/2 pounds or about 5.8 kilograms; also in verse 24
30:23*r That is, about 6 1/4 pounds or about 2.9 kilograms
30:24*r That is, probably about 1 gallon or about 3.8 liters
